reviewText: As a fan of Peter Cushing, I bought this film to add to my collection.  I watched it once and that was enough....boring...

This is a one of a kind horror film, really funky direction and impressive performances. Definitely worth a look.
I heard also that this film was shot in just 48 hours?! I struggle to understand this, as it looks great, the editing is slow paced but the suspense is sustained by the lead actors and excellent direction.
I recommend this to anyone for a tense night in, or a masterclass in film-making!! 5 star.
